title: WOW
body:
I know Riot doesn't have a care about player behavior, in Oceanic servers, but maybe you'll care about people trying to make profit off of your/their game. Anyway thought I'd post this(image attatched), hopefully people like this get banned, thanks.

One other question, when will there be a fully working tribunal? {{champion:238}}

replies.body:
I used to get those all the time. I think that's part of the reason why 'public chat rooms' don't work anymore...

The public chat rooms like "Looking for Group" used to be a constant scroll of ELO boosting and account sale spam.

Does anyone know the right place for the op to report this spam?

Authentically, they're just meant to make a support ticket out of it. It's actually against the universal rules to post information about other summoners in regards to reportable behaviour on the boards.

LOL.
what do you reckon, scam/virus or something ? Or they actually boost your elo.
